snippet.title: Eternity Warriors 2 - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Eternity Warriors 2 by Glu Games Inc.

The battle for Northern Udar rages on! It's been 100 years since the First Demon War ravaged Udar and tore the land apart. Thanks to the brave efforts of the Eternity Warriors the demon threat was held at bay. However the demons have been consolidating their power in a series of Demon Towers built in locations throughout Northern Udar, towers that feed on the magical energies of the land and breed even deadlier forms of demons. 

Now the descendants of the original Eternity Warriors have been tasked with cleansing these Demon Towers and defeating a demon army even deadlier than their predecessors faced a century ago...

• The ULTIMATE DUNGEON CRAWLING action game hits your iPhone and iPad with STUNNING HIGH DEFINITION visuals and EPIC MELEE gameplay! 
• Fluid REAL TIME COMBAT as your warrior faces dozens of NEW demon enemies! Use your SPECIAL SKILLS to slice your way through each floor of the ominous DEMON TOWER.
• ONLINE CO-OP MULTIPLAYER! Battle with a fellow warrior in the all new ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODE!
• COLLECT all new ARMOR, WEAPONS and other LOOT! Upgrade your gear to become the ultimate warrior in Udar!

***Eternity Warriors 2 does not support iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 4th Generation, iPad 1 or earlier devices***

Eternity Warriors 2 is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.

iTunes Store Page:

http://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/eternity-warriors-2/id525458069?mt=8

Homepage:

http://www.glu.com/
